name: where have you been
description:
explanation: it's impossible for me to answer that question,  but i still wanted to express some sort of response. this was made in a few hours and probably won't make sense to anyone other than myself (+ any unfortunate individual who decides to decode certain messages by hand...why would you do that to yourself?!) imagine this as a tumblr vaguepost you can interact with.

message me for content warnings.
